instruction:
Summarize the given text.
Output should be less than 80 words.
input: The iPad Pro has a lot of features that allow users to customize their experience to suit their needs. It comes with features such as Liquid Retina display with ProMotion, FaceID, and A12Z Bionic chip. These features enable users to multitask more efficiently, access more powerful apps, and have a high quality viewing experience. In addition, the device has accessories like the Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard that help users get even more work done.
output: The iPad Pro is an amazing device with plenty of features that make it suitable for heavy multitasking and efficient work. It has a Liquid Retina display with ProMotion and the A12Z Bionic chip that make it powerful and provide an excellent visual experience. It also has the Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard accessories that help users get even more done.
